bonuses.description: Mggoka match ng strike fm'latghor. Fm'latgh. +8% Team Overall
bonuses.title: Performance Enhancing Demons

bonuses.description: Wake up your hitters with a cup of Yes Plz coffee. +10% Team Hitting
bonuses.title: Yes Plz!

bonuses.description: Pseudo-Thumbs burst from the skin on the opposite of your pitchers' hands. +10% Team Pitching
bonuses.title: Pseudo-Thumbs

bonuses.description: Swing Away. The best hitter in the league joins your team.
bonuses.title: Seduction

bonuses.description: It's business. The best pitcher in the league joins your team.
bonuses.title: Defection

bonuses.description: URRRRRRGGHHHHHH. Maxes the stats of a random player on your team.
bonuses.title: Bloodlust

bonuses.description: A random hitter on your team will gain the Gun Blade bat, maxing out their hitting stats.
bonuses.title: Gunblade Bat

bonuses.description: A random pitcher on your team will gain an arm cannon, maxing out their pitching stats.
bonuses.title: Literal Arm Cannon

bonuses.description: They won't stop screaming. Randomizes your team's 5 worst players.
bonuses.title: Soul Swap

bonuses.description: Your team sacrifices a fan from the stands. The Gods show favor. Your team will win all tiebreakers.
bonuses.title: Blood Sacrifice

decrees.description: The last place team in the league will be eliminated from the league, and replaced with a new team.
decrees.title: Relegation

decrees.description: The team with the most fans will Evolve.
decrees.title: Popular Evolution

decrees.description: The bottom four teams in the league gain the Fourth Strike. It will take Four Strikes to strike out any batter on their team for the following Season and Postseason.
decrees.title: The Fourth Strike

decrees.description: Rule Change: When a team is Shamed, they will be punished in the following game. Their next opponent will start with runs equal to the number of runs scored in the Shame period.
decrees.title: Enhanced Shame
